Sick Leave Application for Office
Subject: Sick Leave Application Format for Office

Dear Gautam,

I am writing this application to inform you that I am suffering from a severe viral disease and therefore, I want sick leave from work. I got this infection last night and I will not be capable to come to the office for at least 3. As advised by my doctor, I should take rest and recover appropriately before continuing work. The report from the doctor is also attached for your reference.

I will be available on the phone in case of any emergency cases. Please reach me as per your comfort. For important matters, I have notified

Survi to take care of them to assure that all deadlines are met.

I believe you will understand and grant me leave for the mentioned period. I am waiting for your approval.

Thanks for your consideration.

Yours Sincerely
Reshab
